akn:section.akn:heading: Availability of appropriations: exchange fees; losses in accounts

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 2781. Availability of appropriations: exchange fees; losses in accounts Amounts appropriated to the Department of Defense may be used for—(1) exchange fees; and
(2) losses in the accounts of disbursing officials and agents in accordance with law.
(Added Pub. L. 100–370, § 1(m)(1), July 19, 1988, 102 Stat. 849.)
Historical and Revision NotesSection is based on Pub. L. 99–190, § 101(b) [title VIII, § 8006(c)], Dec. 19, 1985, 99 Stat. 1185, 1203.
(2) losses in the accounts of disbursing officials and agents in accordance with law.
